dataList.content: I don't see any signs of those ex-soldiers around here or up ahead.
The commander did warn us not to go further...
As we proceeded, we discovered bodies that seemed to have been here for quite some time.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: They're our— I mean, L Corp.’s employees...
I see traces of blunt instruments. All the bodies share them, in fact.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: A management report... This document contains instructions for keeping Abnormalities in check.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: But employees tasked with managing an Abnormality usually memorize the instructions perfectly, down to each minute detail... They wouldn't have needed these. So why...?
I daresay none of them had the necessary information when the Abnormality escaped...
... Hmh.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: If the eggs weren’t moved into containment yet... that could be the case.
<There are way too many corpses here.>
What kind of Abnormality could have massacred all these people...?
Hang on... What’s that smell?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: ... You see, our Office purchased a rather expensive gear the other day.
What's this bloke on about?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Sources suggested that toxin levels will begin to rise after a certain floor.
Uh, I’ve been bleeding from my ears for a while now~ should I be worried?
No battle is fought without adversi― Pfehgh, blegh! *hack*

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I was also told that continued exposure may cause bleeding.
Ngh... How come you're okay, though?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: This is... It’s the anti-Abnormality gas grenade supplied to employees.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: One must’ve... *cough* gone off... somewhere among the bodies here...

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Yes. It seems the toxicity level is pretty high around this area.
Hopkins had put on a gas mask before we noticed.
Hey now, what about us?
We weren’t granted any additional supplies.
You slippery rat, you knew about this? Bloody scum, that's what you ar— Ngh...
Heathcliff broke off mid-sentence and dropped to one knee.
Elevated emotional states accelerate blood flow. In other words, the toxin will spread faster.
Try to remain calm, minimize movement, and breathe at regular intervals.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Hopkins... Why... *cough* Why didn’t you warn me?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Oh, I’ve got a question for you too, Yuri.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Why would I make our Office squander its precious funds on expensive gadgets for a dead weight like you to waste?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Let's be real. It's a miracle that you managed to join us in the first place.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Aya may have taken a liking to you, enough to give you special treatment... But now that she's dead, who gives a damn?
Sneaky blighter... How do you live with yourself...?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Don’t be silly, everything’s fair game for a Fixer.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Hearing that the Red Gaze had company tickled my curiosity, but as it turns out...

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: You were just a ragtag band of lunatics who thought it’d be a good idea to waltz right into these death traps without even a bit of research.
Can't believe... we've gotta let that tosser carry on...
Picking up on the hostility, Hopkins backed off and made a quick dash for the exit.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Well, at least I managed to grab an armful of Enkephalin thanks to you.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I’ll write in my report that you all went missing, ‘cause “death by asphyxiation” is just too embarrassing.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Ta-ta.
Yuri slumped to the floor, watching blood pour from her nose to her hands.
And she wasn't the only one. Rodya, Heathcliff, and the other Sinners were writhing in pain as blood gushed out of them.
<Gregor?>
Tsk, I took this with me so you could have something to remember her by...
He was holding the same type of gas mask as the one Hopkins wore.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: But why...
So Miss Aya, she— *cough* —looked after you, huh...? This is as good as yours, then.
As for our unprepared band of lunatics... we do have a way out. Don’t worry about us.
Coughing up blood, Yuri put on the mask.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: ... I know he’s right.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I know it's hard for someone without connections like myself to be appreciated by an Office, no matter how many errands I run for them all day, all night.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: There were only 3 minutes left until the branch was locked down...

dataList.title: L Corp.
dataList.content: [INITIATING SITE BURIAL.]

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: The doors were about to close on me.

dataList.title: L Corp.
dataList.content: [ENERGY TRANSFER IS 85% COMPLETE.]

dataList.title: L Corp. Employee
dataList.content: Yuri, don’t leave me behind! Yuri!

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: So what was I supposed to do?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Is it so wrong that I survived?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: Should I have been buried alive alongside my coworkers?

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: The whole building was being locked down just to keep the Abnormalities from getting out!
*wheeze* It is a sin. Down here, it is.
*cough* *hack* That does sting a bit, Gregor...
I stood there blankly for a moment, then snapped back and looked over at the Sinners.
Half of them were already dead on the ground, and Ishmael’s head drooped just after she said her last words.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: A sin...
But... *wheeze* so what, buddy...
You’ve got to live on like it’s nobody’s business.
*cough* Laying guilt on yourself over spilled milk... will wear your heart out...
Once Gregor drew his last breath, Yuri and I remained the only survivors.
<Uhm... D-don’t worry too much about us. I can take them back there and revive them.>
I knew all Yuri could hear was the mechanical ticking, but I did my best to communicate my words to her nonetheless.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: ... I know.
And she did not speak again for a while.
After a long stretch of heavy, awkward gloom, the toxic gas finally cleared.

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: ... Looks like it’s okay now.
<Hmm? Oh, yeah.>

dataList.title: Grade 8 Fixer
dataList.content: I’ll give you a hand. Let’s go bring your people back to life.
With that, Yuri took off her gas mask and calmly carried the Sinners on her shoulders, one by one.
Unsure how to respond to the look on her face, I decided to keep quiet.
